qas.question: What kind of security determines if files moved to a computer can be played?
What minimum version of iTunes is required to transfer purchased media from an iPod to an authorized computer?

context: <a1_0>iTunes 7<a1_0/> and above can transfer purchased media of the iTunes Store from an iPod to a computer, provided that computer containing the <a0_0>DRM<a0_0/> protected media is authorized to play it.
